channel.title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
channel.description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

item.title: BCD New Baselines Report, Tue May 28 2024 - Fri Jun 07 2024
item.description: Weekly summary of new Baseline items in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
BCD New Baselines Report, Fri Jun 07 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Tue May 28 2024 12:28:46 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Fri Jun 07 2024 19:05:08 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

21 new Baseline implementations

api

  1. Request ➞ cache ➞ only-if-cached  ➞  Added to Chrome, Safari
  2. Response ➞ Response ➞ accept_readablestream  ➞  Added to Firefox, Safari
  3. SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveKey ➞ derivedKeyAlgorithm_option_aes  ➞  Added to Safari
  4. SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveKey ➞ derivedKeyAlgorithm_option_hkdf  ➞  Added to Safari
  5. SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveKey ➞ derivedKeyAlgorithm_option_hmac  ➞  Added to Safari
  6. WebGL2RenderingContext ➞ drawingBufferColorSpace  ➞  Added to Firefox
  7. WebGLRenderingContext ➞ drawingBufferColorSpace  ➞  Added to Firefox

css

  1. properties ➞ content ➞ alt_text  ➞  Added to Firefox
  2. properties ➞ white-space-collapse  ➞  Added to Firefox
  3. types ➞ overflow ➞ overlay  ➞  Added to Safari

html

  1. elements ➞ base ➞ href ➞ forbid_data_javascript_urls  ➞  Added to Firefox

api

  1. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ deviceId_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ echoCancellation_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  3. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ facingMode_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  4. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ frameRate_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  5. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ groupId_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  6. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ height_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  7. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ latency_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  8. MediaStreamTrack ➞ applyConstraints ➞ width_constraint  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari

html

  1. elements ➞ input ➞ required  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. elements ➞ input ➞ size  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
